input:
Support cables in a suspension bridge are most stressed by which of the following forces?  
 (A) shear (B) torsion (C) tension (D) compression

What is the main reason humans need nitrogen to survive?  
 (A) Nitrogen is used in respiration to generate energy. (B) Nitrogen is used in making the proteins in the body. (C) Nitrogen is used to help the body eliminate wastes. (D) Nitrogen is used by nerve cells to conduct impulses.

The phases of the Moon are caused by the  
 (A) tilt of the Earth. (B) tilt of the Moon. (C) revolution of the Earth around the Sun. (D) revolution of the Moon around the Earth.
